DOC.brief_title: Comparison Mineral Trioxide Aggregate ( MTA ) & Ferric Sulfate ( FS ) Pulpotomies
DOC.detailed_description: Comparison clinical radiographic success Mineral Trioxide Aggregate Ferric Sulfate pulpotomies primary molar . Recall appointment complete 6 month , 9 month 12 month . Regular recall follow perform patient MTA FS pulpotomies . Clinical radiographic finding record .
DOC.criteria: ASA I , II Primary Molars diagnose normal reversible pulpitis vital carious pulp exposure Teeth hemostasis achieve pressure No clinical symptom No radiographic sign internal resorption external root resorption Primary Molars diagnose irreversible pulpitis necrotic pulp Teeth achieve hemostasis Teeth abscess fistula Teeth radiographic sign internal resorption external resorption
